standardActions.name: Attack
standardActions.summary: Perform a melee or ranged attack
standardActions.description: The most common action to take in combat. You make an attack with a weapon or an unarmed strike.

standardActions.name: Grapple
standardActions.summary: Seize a creature to reduce speed to 0
standardActions.description: Contest your Strength (Athletics) vs. target's Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics). On success, target is grappled.

standardActions.name: Shove
standardActions.summary: Push a creature prone or 5ft away
standardActions.description: Contest your Strength (Athletics) vs. target's Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics). On success, push target 5ft or knock prone.

standardActions.name: Cast a Spell
standardActions.summary: Cast a spell with casting time of 1 action
standardActions.description: Cast a spell you have prepared or know. The casting time must be '1 Action'.

standardActions.name: Dash
standardActions.description: You gain extra movement for the current turn. The increase equals your speed, after applying any modifiers.

standardActions.name: Disengage
standardActions.description: Your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks for the rest of the turn.

standardActions.name: Dodge
standardActions.description: Until start of your next turn, attack rolls against you have disadvantage (if you can see attacker), and you make DEX saves with advantage.

standardActions.name: Help
standardActions.description: You aid a friendly creature in attacking a task. The creature gains advantage on the next check it makes to perform the task, or the next attack roll against a target.

standardActions.name: Hide
standardActions.description: You attempt to conceal yourself. You must follow the rules for hiding (breaking line of sight, etc).

standardActions.name: Ready
standardActions.description: You wait for a specific circumstance before acting. You choose the action you will take and the trigger that allows you to take it.

standardActions.name: Search
standardActions.description: Depending on the nature of your search, the DM might ask for a Perception or Investigation check.

standardActions.name: Use an Object
standardActions.description: When an object requires your action for its use, you take the Use an Object action. This is also necessary if you want to interact with more than one object in a turn.

bonusActions.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
bonusActions.summary: Attack with a second light weapon
bonusActions.description: When you take the Attack action and attack with a light melee weapon in one hand, you can use a bonus action to attack with a different light melee weapon in the other hand.

bonusActions.name: Cast a Spell
bonusActions.summary: Cast a spell with casting time of 1 bonus action
bonusActions.description: Examples include Healing Word or Misty Step. You cannot cast another spell during the same turn, except for a cantrip with a casting time of 1 action.

reactions.name: Opportunity Attack
reactions.summary: Attack an enemy leaving your reach
reactions.description: You can make a melee attack against a hostile creature that moves out of your reach.

reactions.name: Readied Action
reactions.description: When the trigger you defined in your 'Ready' action occurs, you can use your reaction to take that action.

reactions.name: Cast a Spell
reactions.summary: Cast a spell with casting time of Reaction
reactions.description: Examples include Shield, Counterspell, or Feather Fall.

movement.name: Drop Prone
movement.description: You can drop prone without using any of your speed.

movement.name: Stand Up
movement.description: Standing up takes more effort; doing so costs an amount of movement equal to half your speed.

movement.name: Free Interaction
movement.description: You can interact with one object for free during your turn (e.g., draw a weapon, open a door). A second interaction requires the 'Use an Object' action.

classFeatureActions.name: Rage
classFeatureActions.summary: Enter a battle fury for extra damage and resistance
classFeatureActions.description: Bonus action. Gain advantage on STR checks/saves, +2 damage with STR weapons, resistance to physical damage. Lasts 1 minute.

classFeatureActions.name: Reckless Attack
classFeatureActions.summary: Attack with advantage but enemies get advantage against you
classFeatureActions.description: When you make your first attack on your turn, you can decide to attack recklessly. Gain advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using STR this turn, but attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn.

classFeatureActions.name: Frenzy
classFeatureActions.summary: Make an extra attack while raging
classFeatureActions.description: While raging, you can make a single melee weapon attack as a bonus action on each of your turns. When rage ends, suffer one level of exhaustion.

classFeatureActions.name: Bardic Inspiration
classFeatureActions.summary: Give an ally a d6 inspiration die
classFeatureActions.description: Bonus action. Give an ally a Bardic Inspiration die (d6) they can add to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw within 10 minutes.

classFeatureActions.name: Turn Undead
classFeatureActions.description: Action. Each undead within 30ft that can see or hear you must make a WIS save (DC 8 + proficiency + WIS) or be turned for 1 minute.

classFeatureActions.name: Wild Shape
classFeatureActions.description: Action. Transform into a beast you've seen with CR ≤ level/4. Retain mental stats, gain physical stats and HP of beast form.

classFeatureActions.name: Second Wind
classFeatureActions.description: Bonus action. Regain 1d10 + fighter level HP.

classFeatureActions.name: Action Surge
classFeatureActions.description: On your turn, take one additional action. At 17th level, can use twice before rest (but only once per turn).

classFeatureActions.name: Flurry of Blows
classFeatureActions.summary: Make two unarmed strikes as bonus action
classFeatureActions.description: After taking Attack action, spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a bonus action.

classFeatureActions.name: Patient Defense
classFeatureActions.summary: Take the Dodge action as bonus action
classFeatureActions.description: Bonus action. Spend 1 ki point to take the Dodge action.

classFeatureActions.name: Step of the Wind
classFeatureActions.summary: Disengage or Dash as bonus action
classFeatureActions.description: Bonus action. Spend 1 ki point to take Disengage or Dash action, and your jump distance is doubled.

classFeatureActions.name: Divine Smite
classFeatureActions.summary: Expend spell slot for extra radiant damage
classFeatureActions.description: When you hit with a melee weapon attack, expend a spell slot to deal extra radiant damage: 2d8 for 1st level slot, +1d8 per slot level (max 5d8). +1d8 vs undead/fiends.

classFeatureActions.name: Lay on Hands
classFeatureActions.summary: Touch a creature to restore HP
classFeatureActions.description: Action. Touch a creature to restore HP (pool of paladin level × 5 HP). Can spend 5 HP from pool to cure one disease or poison.

classFeatureActions.name: Hunter's Mark
classFeatureActions.summary: Mark a target for extra damage
classFeatureActions.description: Bonus action (1st level spell slot). Choose a creature within 90ft. Deal extra 1d6 damage when you hit it. Lasts 1 hour (concentration).

classFeatureActions.name: Sneak Attack
classFeatureActions.summary: Deal extra damage once per turn
classFeatureActions.description: Once per turn, deal extra damage when you have advantage or an ally is within 5ft of target. Must use finesse or ranged weapon.

classFeatureActions.name: Cunning Action
classFeatureActions.summary: Dash, Disengage, or Hide as bonus action
classFeatureActions.description: Bonus action. Take Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

classFeatureActions.name: Eldritch Invocations
classFeatureActions.summary: Magical invocations granted by your patron
classFeatureActions.description: You have learned magical invocations. At certain levels, you can choose additional invocations (see class features).

classFeatureActions.name: Arcane Recovery
classFeatureActions.summary: Recover spell slots during short rest
classFeatureActions.description: During a short rest, recover expended spell slots with combined level ≤ half wizard level (rounded up).
